entry.title: Patience is a Virtue
entry.summary:
Author: madiseolar

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,134Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 24

Summary: “I don’t want a vampire in my coven that lacks self-control, lacks discipline. I will not have any untrained souls in my manor, which is why I have to train you. Do you understand?” Chan asks. “Mhm, I understand. S-So you’ll help me? You’ll train me, Sir?” Changbin asks, a glint of hope in his eyes. Chan grins for the first time that night. “Of course. It’ll take a while, you won’t be perfect overnight, but we’ve got nothing but time."Or; Seasoned vampire Chan initiates a late-night training session with his fledgling, Changbin.

entry.title: Waiting For Us
entry.summary:
Author: quietmidnights

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 135,756Chapters: 15/15Kudos: 74

Summary: “Channie?” Felix whispers. He says it so quietly that Chan is only able to hear it because he saw his lips move. Chan nods. “Channie’s here, baby.” “C-Can I come over there?” “Of course,” Chan says softly. “And y-you won’t hurt me?” Chan doesn't let his tears fall. “No, baby, I won’t hurt you. Never.” “Do you promise?” “I promise, Lix. I swear on my life.” He watches Felix swallow. “O-Okay,” he says quietly.When Chan first met Felix, he was quiet, bruised, and flinching at everything around him. Time softened fear into trust, and trust into an easy, sweet friendship – one where everyone knew Felix was Chan’s favorite, and Chan was Felix’s safe space. But when feelings change into something new and a different kind of love starts to unfurl, Felix’s old fears resurface. Muscle memory developed through trauma and pain fights against the gentleness he knows he can trust. For Chan, loving Felix is so, so easy. It’s full of soft words, a steady presence, gentle care, unwavering kindness, and letting him move at his own pace until he can truly believe that this love is different, that he is safe, and that he will never be hurt again.

entry.title: Sugar
entry.summary:
Author: Changbinsthang

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,811Chapters: 12/15Kudos: 135

Summary: Felix never expected his job to lead him here: standing in his boss’s living room, heart pounding as Chris steps closer, voice low and controlled, asking him to name the boundaries he doesn’t want crossed. Their arrangement was supposed to be professional. Structured. Safe. But the air between them is tight with something neither is ready to acknowledge. When Chris invites Felix to a high-stakes company dinner as his plus one—with the promise of subtle touches, whispered cues, and a rival CEO known for showing off—Felix realizes this is no longer just practice. Each session pushes them further, blurring professionalism with want, caution with craving. --- Felix is technically Chris' sugar baby but it's never outright said.

entry.title: Overlap
entry.summary:
Author: odysseyofmemory

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,827Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 66

Summary: “I try not to ask for too much,” Chan says, taking the chopsticks gingerly from her hand. “It’s so rare for me to be selfish.” He takes another rice cake. Another. One more before he’s lifting one to her mouth, scrunching his nose in a silent command to open up. She doesn’t realize how obedient she is until she tastes the sweet heat of the sauce. Chan smiles. Only one dimple showing. He watches her chew, swallow. His thumb swipes at the corner of her mouth. Sucks on the pad of his finger. She can only stare at him, her pulse throbbing in her throat, between her legs. He takes the bowl from her. Sets it neatly in the sink. Traps her between his arms when he puts his hands on the counter behind her. “For once in my life, I want to be selfish,” he whispers. And he’s close. So close. His breath hot on her lips, the tip of his nose bumping against the bridge of hers. “Don’t you?”   or Everyone knows idols shouldn't date their staff. Chan's not sure if he cares anymore.

entry.title: Pretty When You Lie
entry.summary:
Author: Binbin_bean

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,446Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 22

Summary: Chan owns a cozy little café called “Home Brew.” It’s the kind of place where people overshare their lives between sips of coffee. Everyone adores Chan — kind, soft-spoken, always remembering customers’ orders — but Minho sees something off.Because Minho isn’t there for coffee.He’s there undercover.There have been a series of slow, subtle poisonings in the area, all linked to drinks or pastries from that same café — though no proof has ever surfaced. Minho, a detective who prides himself on reading people, is assigned to investigate.Except… Chan doesn’t act like a killer. He’s warm. He’s lonely. And when he looks at Minho, there’s recognition. Something quiet and dangerous.As Minho gets closer, the story teeters between affection and suspicion — are the smiles real, or bait? And when the final cup is poured, Minho realizes he’s in too deep: in love, or in danger — maybe both.Or: A detective walks into a café to catch a killer.He ends up falling for the man who might be one.

entry.title: giving chase
entry.summary:
Author: fensandmarshes

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,630Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 195

Summary: “You knew?” Chan rasps. Like it hadn’t even occurred to him. “Hyung,” Seungmin says again, very disbelieving. He sniffs. “You had to know I knew. Don’t be ridiculous.” He has known Chan was a werewolf since they first crossed paths in a too-crowded JYP cafeteria and Seungmin had felt, humiliatingly, his nose actually twitch as he caught Chan’s scent. The worrying kernel of an idea drops into Seungmin’s stomach too hard and fast to be anything other than instinct, and he bites the inside of his cheek: “Hyung, all this time have you not known about me?”Seungmin has been in love with Chan for years. That isn't actually the biggest secret he's keeping.
